mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room (last_content, time, sender_id, receiver_id, sender_is_deleted, receiver_is_deleted) VALUES (#{last_content}, #{time}, #{sender_id}, #{receiver_id}, #{sender_is_deleted}, #{receiver_is_deleted})
mapper.select: SELECT r1.id, r1.last_content, r1.sender_id, r1.receiver_id, r1.time, r1.sender_is_deleted, r1.receiver_is_deleted, u1.id AS other_id, u1.nickname AS other_nickname, r1.sender_unread_count, r1.receiver_unread_count FROM room r1 INNER JOIN user u1 ON r1.receiver_id = u1.id WHERE sender_id = #{user_id} AND sender_is_deleted = false UNION SELECT r1.id, r1.last_content, r1.sender_id, r1.receiver_id, r1.time, r1.sender_is_deleted, r1.receiver_is_deleted, u1.id AS other_id, u1.nickname AS other_nickname, r1.sender_unread_count, r1.receiver_unread_count FROM room r1 INNER JOIN user u1 ON r1.sender_id = u1.id WHERE receiver_id = #{user_id} AND receiver_is_deleted = false ORDER BY time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE room SET sender_is_deleted = true, sender_unread_count = 0 WHERE id = #{room_id}
UPDATE room SET receiver_is_deleted = true, receiver_unread_count = 0 WHERE id = #{room_id}
